span.desc: This stamp is present in other documents signed by Garibaldi, indicating that they were part of the Autografoteca Campori. Above the signature, the stamp contains the inscription "CODICI E MSS CAMPOLI" within an arch that surrounds a coat of arms.

zone.note: Later annotation at the top of the page.

address.p: Letter address in the center of the page, written in landscape orientation.

span.desc: Editorial note referring to the upper half of a stamp visible in the document, containing the inscription "CI E MSS. CAM" within an arch that surrounds the upper half of a coat of arms. This stamp appears in other documents signed by Garibaldi and likely belonged to the Autografoteca Campori.
